name: Kid in the Mall
description:
Controls

WASD to move. Arrow Keys: Adjust camera. E: Interact / pickup items. F: Interact with people. Return key: Reset.

Description

Kid is lost in a mall and has now the chance to explore it in it's own favor. 

Credits

Everything you see, all the music and everything you can do ist designed and realized by DrDeadlock.

The SFX credits go to freesounds.org.
